amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent the enforcement of limitations or prohibitions on the use of genetically modified crops in commercial agricultural operations conducted on National Wildlife Refuges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Abraham amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Abraham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Abraham amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
